home.title: Where games meet growth
home.description: LAG - Mental Wellness Meets E-Sports Culture

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We are LAG, a psychological initiative from Imam Muhammad ibn Saud Islamic University, striving to integrate mental health concepts with gaming culture in an interactive, enjoyable, and science-based way. We believe that behind every successful gamer is a mind that needs care, balance, and a voice to be heard amidst the noise of competition.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be pioneers in psychological awareness in the world of esports, where mental health becomes an integral part of the gaming experience, and we build a supportive digital environment that encourages personal and professional growth.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Learn more about our team and mission

doctorCards.title: Book Your Consultation
doctorCards.subtitle: Choose from available mental health specialists

doctor1.name: Raghad Almoein
doctor1.experience: Clinical and professional experience handling psychological disorders
doctor1.description: Sports psychologist at LAG company, specialized in analyzing psychological and behavioral data of players, providing periodic reports reflecting their mental readiness. Offers individual sessions to enhance performance and cope with stress, organizes workshops on anxiety, anger, and self-motivation. Has clinical expertise enabling effective individual interventions.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Meet the amazing people behind LAG

raghad.name: Rahaf Almutairi
raghad.description: Specialized in building and managing communities and enhancing user experience within digital platforms.

ahmad.name: Ahmad Almutairi
ahmad.description: Specialized in academic psychology with expertise in mental health and comprehensive psychological assessment.

joinTeam.title: Join Our Team
joinTeam.description: Are you ready to be part of an amazing journey? We're looking for passionate individuals who want to make a difference in the gaming and mental health community.

gameRecommendations.title: Game Recommendation
gameRecommendations.Apex Legends: You are a legend in battle royale games. Apex Legends is your match!
gameRecommendations.Valorant: Sharp aim and tactical play? Valorant is for you!
gameRecommendations.COD/Warzone: You Lead in action-packed battles. COD/Warzone is your field!
gameRecommendations.Dota 2: A master strategist. Dota 2 will challenge your mind!
gameRecommendations.League of Legends: You love team fights and smart plays. League of Legends is your arena!
gameRecommendations.CS2: Precise and tactical. CS2 is your test!
gameRecommendations.R6 Siege: Teamwork and tactics? R6 Siege is your game!
gameRecommendations.Overwatch 2: You shine in team action. Overwatch 2 is your playground!
gameRecommendations.Rocket League: Creative and skillful. Rocket League is your goal!
gameRecommendations.EA FC 25: Football excitement. EA FC 25 is your pitch!
gameRecommendations.Rennsport: Love speed? Rennsport is your track!
gameRecommendations.Chess: Thinker and planner. Chess is your classic challenge!
gameRecommendations.TFT: Strategy and clever moves. TFT is your board!
gameRecommendations.StarCraft II: Strategy and quick decisions. StarCraft II is your galaxy!
gameRecommendations.Tekken 8: One-on-one battles. Tekken 8 is your ring!
gameRecommendations.Street Fighter 6: Epic showdowns. Street Fighter 6 is your stage!
gameRecommendations.Free Fire: Fast action anywhere. Free Fire is your game!
gameRecommendations.Mobile Legends: Gaming on the go. Mobile Legends is your arena!
gameRecommendations.PUBG Mobile: Ready for mobile battle. PUBG Mobile is your ground!
gameRecommendations.PUBG Battlegrounds: Survivor and fighter. PUBG Battlegrounds is your challenge!
gameRecommendations.noMatch: No match found. Try different answers!

results.title: Gaming Master!
results.description: Based on your gaming preferences, here are your personalized game recommendations!
results.suggestedText: Your gaming profile shows excellent potential! Keep exploring different genres and challenge yourself with new games to improve your skills.
results.excellent: Outstanding! You have a perfect gaming profile with diverse interests and strong strategic thinking.
results.good: Great! You can explore more game genres to expand your gaming experience and discover new favorites.
results.fair: Good foundation! Try different gaming styles to find what truly excites you and matches your skills.
results.needsImprovement: Keep exploring! There are many amazing games out there that could become your new favorites.

trk511.name: Trk511
trk511.description: A talented Saudi player in Rocket League distinguished by high technical skills and ability to execute complex moves. Known for his aggressive and creative playstyle.

rw9.name: Rw9
rw9.description: A professional Saudi player distinguished by speed and accuracy in Rocket League. Known for his ability to play under pressure and score decisive goals in crucial moments.

kiileerrz.name: Kiileerrz
kiileerrz.description: A talented young Saudi player in Rocket League distinguished by high energy and enthusiasm. Known for his team spirit and ability to boost his teammates' morale.

msdossary.name: Msdossary
msdossary.description: FIFA World Champion and one of the greatest electronic football players. Distinguished by tactical intelligence and exceptional ability to read the game.

aydan.name: Aydan
aydan.description: An American professional Call of Duty player distinguished by high combat skills. Known for his aggressive style and ability to achieve amazing individual performances.

zsmit.name: zSmit
zsmit.description: A professional Call of Duty player distinguished by accuracy and stability. Known for his ability to work effectively with the team and execute strategies precisely.

almond.name: Almond
almond.description: A professional Call of Duty player distinguished by flexibility and adaptability. Known for his cheerful personality and ability to make the atmosphere enjoyable for the team.

magnus.name: Magnus Carlsen
magnus.description: World Chess Champion and one of the greatest players in history. Distinguished by exceptional strategic intelligence and deep thinking ability.

hikaru.name: Hikaru Nakamura
hikaru.description: Chess Grandmaster and famous content creator. Distinguished by quick thinking and ability to play fast while maintaining high level.

chovy.name: Chovy
chovy.description: An exceptional Korean mid-lane player in League of Legends. Distinguished by high individual skills and ability to control the game from his position.

ruler.name: Ruler
ruler.description: A professional Korean ADC player distinguished by stable and reliable performance. Known for his ability to deal high damage in team fights.

manubachoore.name: ManuBachoore
manubachoore.description: A professional FIFA player distinguished by technical skills and creativity in play. Known for his ability to execute complex moves and score amazing goals.

vejrgang.name: Vejrgang
vejrgang.description: A Danish professional FIFA player distinguished by calmness and focus. Known for his balanced style and ability to perform under pressure.

exnid.name: Exnid
exnid.description: A professional Call of Duty player distinguished by advanced combat skills. Known for his ability to adapt to different playstyles.
